twincleave.name: Twincleave
twincleave.desc: Dart around the battlefield with devastating cleaves delivered in quick succesion.

flashdraw_strike.name: Flashdraw Strike
flashdraw_strike.desc: Swiftly unsheathe your blade and deliver an upwards strike.

slice_n_dice.name: Slice 'n' Dice
slice_n_dice.desc: Step forward and slice through your enemies. Ability can be activated again on successful hit.

prominence_draw.name: Prominence Draw
prominence_draw.desc: Close the distance and deliver a fast slash.

masters_flourish.name: Master's Flourish
masters_flourish.desc: A powerful slash that chips through block and slashes through armor.
